DOC.brief_title: Systematic Review And Meta-Analysis Of Psoriasis Treatments .

DOC.criteria: Randomized control clinical trial treatment moderatetosevere plaque psoriasis . Trials evaluate least one following : Physician 's Global Assessment ( PGA ) , Dermatology Life Quality Index ( DLQI ) and/or ShortForm 36 ( SF36 ) .
